item.title: Shakshuka
item.description: Note: it’s pretty versatile - easily can be adjusted. The core is just spice, tomatos and eggs. Ingredients 2 tbsp olive oil small red onion or 2 x shallots 2 tbsp harissa paste 2 tsp tomato puree 4 tsp muscovado sugar 2 large red peppers (diced) 4 minced garlic gloves 1 tsp ground cumin 2 bay leaves 800g tomatos 4 eggs 120g labneh or feta bunch of corriander salt nb: feel free to add carrots, courgettes, spinach etc.
